title: LHUB LXP
description:
LHUB LXP aims to be a strategic Lifelong Learning Platform to help Singapore’s workforce stay relevant and competitive.

With LHUB LXP, transform yourself anytime, anywhere — the mobile application offers limitless learning at your fingertips! 

In addition to online learning, LHUB LXP also serves as a platform for jobs and skills development for both workers and companies.
descriptionHTML:
LHUB LXP aims to be a strategic Lifelong Learning Platform to help Singapore’s workforce stay relevant and competitive.

With LHUB LXP, transform yourself anytime, anywhere — the mobile application offers limitless learning at your fingertips!

In addition to online learning, LHUB LXP also serves as a platform for jobs and skills development for both workers and companies.
developerAddress:
1 Marina Boulevard, #15-09
One Marina Boulevard,
Singapore 018989
comments: Poorly conceived application. Registration redirected to webpage and course info cannot be viewed. All that can be done is view course titles (not course description, or even course dates can be seen). Disappointed that NTUC released such application.
This is an absolutly important app for the workers by the workers. Delightful interface with wide range of courses. Upskill, retrain and learn new skills. Excellent!

Kindly make this as a full application and not Web based application. I'm unable to view what are the online courses I've enrolled because everytime I search and click on the course video, it will redirect me to browser. It does not reflect in my application
I am a PAID LHUB user before this weird app going on and i am unable to login at all! Please refund my subscription!!
Can't apply for course. Kept on leading me back to membership page.
Can't even register by using personal email
I am unable to access the courses after paying. Kept bringing me back to the home page. What is going on NTUC?
Useless uninstalled. No information on the course, keep launch the website to subscribe.
